generate-answer.description: Generates an answer from a Dashworks bot.

props.name: botId
props.description: You can find this by going to Dashworks > Bots, clicking on an existing Bot, and using the 'Copy Bot ID' button on the top right.

props.name: message
props.description: The message (e.g., a question or prompt) that you want a response to.

props.name: inlineSources
props.description: When true (default), sources will be cited inline in markdown formatting within the answer text.When false, the answer will not contain inline citations.
